t: Amazon Brand Stores: Design & Develop (Updated) | Perpetua
s: The Header image — This is the horizontal image at the top of your Amazon Brand Store. As it is the first content that a shopper will see, it should announce your brand in a clean and clear way. You can use text in your header image but you should focus on displaying a branded image and your logo.

t: Add CloudFront request headers - Amazon CloudFront
s: Add CloudFront HTTP request headers to determine the viewer's device type, IP address, geographic location, request protocol (HTTP or HTTPS), HTTP version, TLS connection details, and JA4 fingerprint.
